mapper.select: select reply.*, user.nickname, user.level_image from reply left join simple_board.user on reply.user_idx=user.idx where reply.board_idx=#{boardIdx} order by reply_seq asc;
mapper.insert: insert into reply(board_idx, user_idx, content, reply_group_idx) value(#{boardIdx},#{userIdx},#{content}, #{replyGroupIdx});
mapper.select: select sum(re.total_count) from (select count(*) as total_count from simple_board.reply where board_idx=#{boardIdx} union all select count(*) as total_count from simple_board.rereply where board_idx=#{boardIdx})re;
mapper.update: update reply set content=#{content}, reply_modify_date=now() where idx=#{idx} and board_idx=#{boardIdx} and user_idx=#{userIdx};
mapper.delete: delete from reply where idx=#{idx} and board_idx=#{boardIdx} and user_idx=#{userIdx};
